title.rendered: March- April 2021: Moving In Feminism With Adolescent Leaders In Action (MIFALI)- Study and strengthening workshop

content.rendered: March- April 2021: Moving In Feminism With Adolescent Leaders In Action (MIFALI)- Study and strengthening workshop: to generate comprehensive data on the situation of adolescent-engaged and adolescent-led organizing in Cameroon with particular focus on MIFALI. The research and the capacity building workshop were sponsored by the Global Fund for Women to have two outcomes: a report providing relevant information to deepen understanding of the context within which MIFALI is situated and enable fact-based intervention, next, three-year programmatic strategy to foster voice, leadership, and agency of the movement.
